ValidationRule.description: Ensures that the fax field is properly validated.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF( OR(ISCHANGED(Fax ) && NOT(ISNULL(Fax)) && NOT(ISBLANK(Fax )) && !REGEX(Fax ,'^\\d{10,25}$'), ISNEW() && NOT(ISNULL(Fax )) && NOT(ISBLANK(Fax )) && !REGEX(Fax ,'^\\d{10,25}$')),true,false)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Invalid format entered for fax. The minimum number of digits should be 10
